ceeseConvo.name: none
ceeseConvo.text: (the shutter clicks, and Ceese takes a selfie of the two of you with her polaroid.)

ceeseConvo.name: fyve
ceeseConvo.text: A warning woulda been nice. If I die, this crappy picture is the last memory you'll have of me.

ceeseConvo.name: ceese
ceeseConvo.text: You're not gonna die, Fyve. We all know you're gonna stop Fate from ruininâ€™ the world or whatever.

ceeseConvo.name: ceese
ceeseConvo.text: So we can look back on this awful day and laugh about it.

ceeseConvo.name: ceese
ceeseConvo.text: I don't have much else to offer right now but optimism.

ceeseConvo.name: ceese
ceeseConvo.text: Besides, when have I EVER warned someone of an impending selfie?
